description: The mandatory dismantling data model is intended to ensure that end-of-life vehicles are disposed of properly. It defines components, parts and materials that must be mandatorily dismantled, as well as the necessary provision of information on those components, parts and materials to be dismantled

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_2.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.mandatory_dismantlin.description: Describes a Property which contains a number.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.quantity_2.0..description: The quantity value associated with the unit expressed as float.
Characteristic for mass measurements of an item.

value.description: The quantity value associated with the unit.

unit.description: The unit of a mass related attribute.

urn_samm_io.catenax.mandatory_dismantlin.description: The characteristic of Concentration.
Encapsulates list of  relevant attributes for substance of concern.

number.description: Number of specific pollutant, component or part.

part.description: The part or component that contains the specific pollutant.

location.description: String specifying the location of the pollutant , component or part.

weight.description: Weight of the pollutant , component or part in grams

minimumConcentration.description: Minimum weight percentage of pollutant concentration to be dismantled

weightOfPart.description: Weight of part containing pollutant in gram
